title: Quiz 11: Proposal Writing
description: Structure and components of research proposals.

questions.question: Which of the following are mandatory sections of a Research Proposal? (Select all that apply)
questions.explanation: Introduction, Literature Review, and Methodology are mandatory. Results/Discussion are in the final REPORT.
questions.hint: Think about what goes into a proposal before research begins.

questions.question: A research proposal should be written in the ___BLANK___ tense.
questions.explanation: Proposals use future tense as they describe what WILL be done.

questions.question: What is the maximum word count for an abstract in a proposal (according to general guidelines)?
The KMTC logo should be included on the cover page of the proposal.
questions.explanation: KMTC guidelines state the logo should NOT be on the cover page.

questions.question: Match the proposal section to its content.

pairs.right: Describes the issue and why it is a problem
Explains why the study is important/benefits
Describes design, sampling, and data collection
Brief summary of the entire proposal

questions.explanation: Problem Statement describes the issue, Justification explains importance, Methodology describes how, Abstract summarizes all.
questions.hint: Think about what each section contains.

questions.question: Where should the 'Declaration' page appear?
questions.explanation: Declaration appears after the Title Page.

questions.question: Order the preliminary pages of a report.
questions.explanation: Order: Title → Declaration → Dedication → Acknowledgement → Table of Contents.

questions.question: The Discussion section is part of the Research Proposal.
questions.explanation: Discussion is part of the final Report, not the Proposal.
questions.hint: Discussion happens after results are known.

questions.question: What section contains raw data tools like questionnaires and consent forms?
questions.explanation: Appendices contain supplementary materials like questionnaires and consent forms.
questions.hint: Think about where extra materials go.

questions.question: What font type and size is recommended for KMTC proposals?
questions.explanation: KMTC recommends Times New Roman 11 or 12.
